divs: Sighting DetailsI was watching the fireworks from my backyard, looking north I could see a red beacon light, then just above it and a little to the east there appeared to be an Orange Ball of Light, I looked though the binoculars and it didn't look any different, it traveled south for a while then veered to the south west and disappeared. A few minutes later I saw another one that traveled the same path. They were in no hurry then they just disappeared.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Russiaville
This sighting has never been favorited.
